alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 1:39PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elko County through 230 PM PDT... At 137 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm and blowing dust over Spring Creek, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. Blowing dust will diminish visibility to 1/2 mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamoille and Spring Creek, including portions of I-80 from east of Elko to Deeth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County
